price: 35. Ugnies liežuviai ir (išlyditas) varis bus pasiųsti ant jūsų, ir jūs negalėsite nuo jų apsiginti.
arabic: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yur'salu ʿalaykumā shuwāẓun min nārin wanuḥāsun falā tantaṣirāni
translations: you will (be able to) defend yourselves
